Role / Purpose: Primary key for unique production title across seasons.
Connected Data Sources: Ticketing (productions), history_city_sales, production metadata, marketing campaigns.
Format & Constraints: string/ID; must be unique and stable.
Notes: Create mapping from ticketing 'production' table and backfill for historical CSV.

Role / Purpose: Human-readable label for production; secondary join key.
Format & Constraints: string; may vary slightly by year (e.g., 'The Nutcracker 2024').
Notes: Use mainly for display; map to show_title_id before modelling.

Role / Purpose: Season identifier grouping productions by year (e.g., 2024–25).
Connected Data Sources: Production plan, ticketing, financial reporting, marketing budgets.
Notes: Standardise via dim_season table; attach to each production.

Connected Data Sources: history_city_sales (implicitly), ticketing performances, marketing spend by city.
Notes: Normalise city labels; avoid free text.

Role / Purpose: Unique venue identifier for Jubilee and any other locations.
Connected Data Sources: Ticketing venue table, capacity reference, performance schedule.
Notes: Link to dim_venue with capacity, city, and configuration.

Connected Data Sources: Ticketing transactions, performance schedule, seat inventory.
Notes: Needed if moving from show-level to performance-level modelling.

Connected Data Sources: Performance schedule, weather data, city events calendars.
Notes: Key for joining to daily weather and external events.

Role / Purpose: Date tickets first go on sale for the run.
Notes: Used to calculate days_on_sale and align marketing start.

Role / Purpose: Key linking production to marketing campaigns and metrics.
Notes: Maintain campaign metadata table mapping to show_title_id/season/city.

Role / Purpose: Accounting period key for financial and macro joins.
Notes: Derive from performance_date or season; align with internal fiscal calendar.
Standardise labels to match StatsCan and other official sources.
